name: marketplace-platform
description: Multi-marketplace platform with Deals, Coupons, Products & Services

scripts.start:dev: npm run docker:up && npm run dev:full
scripts.dev:full: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run services" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
